course.subject: TEMG
course.name: Special Project: Smarter e-Commerce for Google HK
course.description: “How might Google Hong Kong offer an end-to-end sales and marketing model leveraging latest advancements in technologies to create synergies between offline and online channels?” Students in this 4-credits experiential-learning course will learn the theory of consulting and digital marketing, and conduct best practice research in data analytics, omnichannel retail, AI/ML, AR/VR, Iot, Beacons, etc.. They will work in teams to formulate strategy recommendations for 1 of the 4 Google Sector Managers, including Consumer Electronics, Telco, CPG and High-end Beauty sectors. Upon completion of this class, interested student will get a “pass” on the first round of job interview with Google HK. Enrollment in the project course requires approval of the course instructor.
